summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4235 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue Northwest, from West 57th Street to West 59th Street on the east; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50313, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
